#Text=The intermission was over , everyone was reseated and those in the back re-joined the rest of the audience for the remainder of the event .
#Text=The speaker came back up and announced the names of those who had just joined the Sea Org .
#Text=Immediate standing ovation !
#Text=Loud cheers !
#Text=We were going to be heroes !
#Text=My mom flipped out , " No way — do n’t they realize that you ’re still a minor ?

column1: #Text=Finally , after being promised that I would absolutely continue my schooling to obtain a high school diploma , have three weeks off a year to come home to visit and be able to maintain routine communication with the family ( all of which turned out to be a blatant lie ) , my mother signed a parental consent form , giving her approval for me to join the Sea Org – effective once I turned 16 , which was only a few weeks away .
#Text=The recruiters had me list out things to handle before reporting for duty .
#Text=My main concern was telling my dad , who knew nothing about Scientology .
#Text=They said what I needed was a cover story , so tell him that I got a great offer and I ’ll be going away to become a model in Paris .
#Text=My mother and I went to visit my dad and that ’s what we told him .
#Text=He was so proud of me !
#Text=I thought I was going to be sick .
#Text=Within a few weeks of signing my Sea Org contract , I was booked on a flight to Los Angeles .
#Text=This was the first time I had been away from home and the first airplane I had ever been on .
#Text=I arrived in Hollywood , California on 31 October 1979 .
#Text=Why did you choose to write a book about your experiences ?

#Text=I felt it was very important to not only thoroughly review what I had just gone through for my 27 years as a staff member for Scientology , but to make that experience known to others so they can learn what goes on behind the scenes .
#Text=The beginning services in Scientology seem very sensible and helpful .
#Text=It 's like the bait and once you nibble on it , they get a hook into you and it 's NOT easy to free yourself once you 're hooked .
#Text=Making the information known will hopefully enlighten people so they can see just how controlling and demanding and abusive the organization is – and stay clear of it themselves .
